title: juggernauts should not be able to use mobility summoner spells
body:
this includes tp

if their weakness is kitability, why circumvent that weakness by allowing them to get extra mobility?

they're already by far the strongest role in the game right now lol, a garen can outmobility most assasins including zed and yasuo

replies.body: How much weed did you smoke to post this?
Well this takes the stupid award of the day.
Methinks he lost to a Juggernaut and is a little miffed about it.

> [{quoted}](name=EbonyBladeJ88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=99ONOVKM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-08-14T17:10:20.853+0000)
>
> Methinks he lost to a Juggernaut and is a little miffed about it.

I stopped using the forums, one day i decided to check the game play section, I found out why I stopped.
what is this even? how in hell is a huge CD summoner allowing something with no mobility to "outmobility" a Zed or Yasuo? when they also have access to this summoner spell?

To be fair, Ghost has a pretty low CD for a summoner spell. I could maybe live with having it increased an extra minute if Riot would remove the movespeed ramp on it and allow certain champions to use it in lieu of Flash, but otherwise I'm worried people like this are going to encourage Riot to nerf the spell into unusability (Which is a shame because Darius REALLY needs his fucking Ghost).
so do assassins get barred from using flash?
Obviously not. Only juggernauts get shafted because Darius dunked him one too many times.

Ghost isn't the mobility spell you think it is. The nerf they gave it a couple years ago made it so you can't take it without flash anymore. I remember in those days I'd run TP/Ghost on Darius since I could use them both to extend my lead bot lane.
Sounds like someone just got rekt.
I kinda of agree with this. If Darius’s weakness is mobility then why is he allowed to take phase rush, ghost, flash, and build a phage item so he still have mobility. I really doesn’t make sense
